comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: September 1902, from the banner on the Belmore (First & Last) Hotel advertising acts at the Tivoli theatre. A Trove search of "Nawn Wilton Tivoli" produced this from the SMH of Saturday 20/9/1902 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14507894 . I wonder if the photo was taken from the then-being-built Sydney Harbour Trust Building - www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/2715092837/ ? Wonderful photo and amazing to see such detail via the persistent URL Zoomify.

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: There's a similar view in this Circular Quay panorama which appeared in the Sydney Mail in December 1902...it's difficult to tell whether the Tivoli advert appears in the Sydney Mail panorama...the panorama is on the next page - news.google.com/newspapers?id=Qm1VAAAAIBAJ&sjid=Y5UDA...
